original_title: Turn On, Tune In, Drop Out
overview: 5 psychedelic short films, broadcast on the French/German tv channel "arte" on 2007-07-16  "Be-In" USA 1967, 7 min  "Beatles Electronique" USA 1966-69, 3 min  "San Francisco" Great Britain 1967/68, 15 min.  "Andy Warhol's Exploding Plastic Inevitable" USA/Great Britain 1967, 12 min.  "Eyetoon" USA 1967/68, 8 min.
title: Turn On, Tune In, Drop Out
